message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose we discuss a fair price that reflects both its worth and your interest. To start, how about we consider a price of $120? This allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement while ensuring you get a great deal on a product you value highly.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product to me. However, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  To make this work, I'd be willing to pay $105. This price would still allow you to make a good profit while allowing me to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. Considering your offer and the value of the product to you, I propose we set the price at $110. This allows us to move closer to a mutually agreeable solution while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me.
